Name: Calisthenics Foundation
Description: The foundational skills required for all advanced calisthenics moves.

Name: Pulling Strength
Description: Focus on vertical and horizontal pulling movements.

Name: Australian Rows
Description: Beginner horizontal pull. Focus on scapular retraction.

Name: Chin Ups
Description: Standard vertical pull. Goal: 3 sets of 8 reps.

Name: L-Sit Pull Ups
Description: Advanced pull variation that engages the core heavily.

Name: Muscle Up
Description: The dynamic transition from a pull to a push above the bar.

Name: Pushing Strength
Description: Focus on horizontal and vertical pushing movements.

Name: Incline Push Ups
Description: Easiest horizontal push, focus on elbow tuck.

Name: Dips
Description: Vertical pushing foundation. Keep elbows close to the body.

Name: Handstand Push Ups
Description: The ultimate vertical push. Start against a wall.

Name: Freestanding HSPU
Description: Requires significant balance and shoulder stability.

Name: Core & Legs
Description: Essential for stability and dynamic skills.

Name: Pistol Squats
Description: Single-leg strength for balance and power.
